divs: sighting detailsi do not remember the date. we were on the west side of the salton sea. it had been dark for about 1\2 hour; we had just finished riding our dirt bikes. i left the motor home to get in my truck to drive home. i was admiring the bright stars. in the southeast sky five lights appeared one by one. they were high in the sky and in a straight line and the same distance apart. the lights did not move at all and appeared for 30-45 sec. i am guessing but the distance between the first and last light was about 1 1\2 miles. the lights simply went out after 30-45 sec. i immediately new the objects were foreign. they lights were too straight, too bright, too far apart and did not move at all. i was very excited and yelled for my friend to get out of the motor home. as soon as i heard the door shut was when the lights disappeared. and of course he laughed when i told the story. i never told it again until now. thank, kurt
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Salton City
There were no other sightings in Salton City on or around March 11th 2006
Summary: series of lights appeared in the sky in a straight line
